channel.title: Help With Project 16 4.5 Sorce, How do you get magic pking?
channel.description:
Well on the server I love pking but its only with range/melee and there is no mage, whenever you mage text comes up "You are not in a pking area" but we are around mage bank. So I wondering if there is a way to make magics work in the wilderness.
Note: I know chances are there is no way to do it but any help would be great.

item.title: Help With Project 16 4.5 Sorce, How do you get magic pking?
